original_text: And Levi made him a great feast in his own house: and there was a great company of publicans and of others that sat down with them.
korean_text: 레위가 예수를 위하여 자기 집에서 큰 잔치를 하니 세리와 다른 사람이 많이 함께 앉아 있는지라

sentences.original_text: And Levi made him a great feast
sentences.korean_translation: 레위는 그를 위해 큰 잔치를 베풀고

sentences.original_text: and there was a great company
